name: Beacon Roofing Supply, Inc.
description: Beacon Roofing Supply, Inc. is a leading distributor of residential and commercial roofing materials and related building products in North America. Established in 1928, the company has grown significantly through a series of strategic acquisitions and organic growth. Beacon operates over 400 branches across the United States and Canada, serving contractors and builders with high-quality materials from renowned manufacturers. The company specializes in a wide range of products, including asphalt shingles, metal roofing, commercial roofing systems, and insulation materials. Beacon is committed to providing exceptional customer service, expert advice, and timely delivery, ensuring that its customers can complete their projects efficiently. As a publicly traded company, Beacon focuses on sustainable growth and maintaining strong relationships with suppliers and customers alike. The company also emphasizes safety and environmental responsibility in its operations, aligning with industry standards and best practices. With a robust logistics network and a dedicated team, Beacon Roofing Supply is well-positioned to meet the evolving needs of the construction industry and contribute to building the future.
